quote: My way of joking is to tell the truth. It's the funniest joke in the world.
author: George Bernard Shaw,  John Bull's Other Island

quote: Someday we'll look back on this and it will all seem funny.
author: Bruce Springsteen

quote: If it gets laughs, it's funny.
author: Rachel Dratch

quote: It's a funny old world.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: If you were half as funny as you think you are, you'd be twice as funny as you really are.
author: H.N. Turteltaub,  The Sacred Land

quote: I appreciate humor so much, but I'm actually not a funny girl.
author: Emmanuelle Chriqui

quote: Tyler lies back and asks, "If Marilyn Monroe were alive right now, what would she be doing?"I say, goodnight.The headliner hangs down in shreds from the ceiling and Tyler says, "Clawing at the lid of her coffin.
author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Fight Club

quote: When a thing is funny, search it carefully for a hidden truth.
author: George Bernard Shaw,  Back to Methuselah

quote: That is the saving grace of humor, if you fail no one is laughing at you.
author: A. Whitney Brown

quote: I think being funny is not anyone's first choice.
author: Woody Allen

quote: However, frat-boy humor is funny and it always will be.
author: Craig Kilborn

quote: Gags die, humor doesn't.
author: Jack Benny

quote: There’s nothing funny about war. Well, aside from this joke Orafoura told me: What did WWI say to WWII? I wish I could tell you the punch line, but the restaurant was so noisy that I didn’t hear it. But I laughed anyway, because I’ll bet it was pretty funny.
author: Jarod Kintz,  $3.33

quote: If I can't see the humor in it, how am I going to be funny?
author: Casey Affleck

quote: I'm not funny. What I am is brave.
author: Lucille Ball

quote: I've got a sense of humor. I'm a funny guy.
author: Daryl Hall

quote: Humor is laughing at what you haven't got when you ought to have it.
author: Langston Hughes

quote: Never say a humorous thing to a man who does not possess humor. He will always use it in evidence against you.
author: Herbert Beerbohm Tree

quote: As soon as you have made a thought, laugh at it.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: I think you learn more if you're laughing at the same time.
author: Mary Ann Shaffer

quote: Everything is funny, as long as it's happening to somebody else.
author: Will Rogers

quote: What doesn't kill us makes us funnier.
author: Marian Keyes,  The Other Side of the Story

quote: Everything is funny as long as it is happening to somebody else.
author: Will Rogers

quote: I don't know if my sense of humor goes over Americans' heads.
author: Ryan Kwanten

quote: You can't be funny if you don't have good material.
author: Matt LeBlanc

quote: Humor is always based on a modicum of truth. Have you ever heard a joke about a father-in-law?
author: Dick Clark

quote: Married people should not be quick to hear what is said by either when in ill humor.
author: Samuel Richardson

quote: A joke's a very serious thing.
author: Charles Churchill

quote: Half the battle is that people have to like you before you say one joke, one bit of humor.
author: Don Rickles

quote: Alice laughed. 'There's no use trying,' she said. 'One can't believe impossible things.'I daresay you haven't had much practice,' said the Queen. 'When I was your age, I always did it for half-an-hour a day. Why, sometimes I've believed as many as six impossible things before breakfast. There goes the shawl again!
author: Lewis Carroll

quote: The president of General Motors was in a foul humor.
author: Arthur Hailey

quote: I'm direct, I'm unpretentious and I'm pretty dogged, and I hope I've got a capacity to laugh at myself and not take myself too seriously.
author: John Howard

quote: Some men have actually died from laughing. That's so funny I fear for my own life.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: What we're doing is fun - if you have any sense of humor at all!
author: Calvin Klein

quote: Funny is a good foil. Humor is illuminating, and it also gives you power.
author: J. Tillman

quote: Sometimes it takes ten seconds to see some humor in your dilemmas, sometimes ten years.
author: Allen Klein

quote: I don't have a very quick sense of humor.
author: Florenz Ziegfeld

quote: Conservative humor is frankly harder than liberal humor. You get points for just being liberal. You can get more points if you make fun of your own side sometimes.
author: Ted Rall

quote: Humor is reason gone mad.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: Everything is funnier in retrospect, funnier and prettier and cooler. You can laugh at anything from far enough away.
author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Stranger than Fiction

quote: I look at things logically. The humor I do is to go from A to B to C to D, and F is the funny.
author: Ron Shock

quote: Keep your sense of humor, my friend; if you don't have a sense of humor it just isn't funny anymore.
author: Wavy Gravy

quote: But if you don't watch me, I will try and sneak in some humor. I see humor everywhere in life around me.
author: Marion Ross

quote: I have a very silly sense of humor. I've never laughed harder in my entire life than seeing someone with toilet paper stuck on the bottom of their shoe.
author: Paula Poundstone

quote: I think God has a sense of humor, and the way my lessons come from God is very funny. I have to laugh at myself even if it's a tough lesson.
author: Yvette Nicole Brown

quote: It's always funny until someone gets hurt. Then it's just hilarious.
author: Bill Hicks

quote: What is humor?' one of their professors had posed, and he had answered, ''nondangerous, unexpectedly inappropriate juxtaposition.
author: Sena Jeter Naslund,  Four Spirits

quote: My wife, my daughters, even my grandchildren are funny. You've got to keep a sense of humor because anger destroys you.
author: Michael Caine

quote: I don't think I would describe my sense of humor. Doesn't sound like the kind of thing I'd do.
author: Tommy Lee Jones

quote: We don't appreciate the value of humor sometimes.
author: Janet Evanovich
